  • Help

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ball
Ball is the abstract base class for all ball classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all ball classes.
BallModel
Model class of the ball, which defines the attributes (radius, position of five feature points) of the ball and provides methods to access/modify these attributes.
Brick
Brick is the abstract base class for all brick classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all brick classes.
BrickFactory
BrickFactory is the class which takes the responsibility of making bricks for all levels of the game.
BrickModel
Model class of the brick, which defines the attributes (width, height and the position of the left-top point) of the brick and provides methods to access/modify these attributes.
CementBrick
CementBrick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class CrackedBrick, with full strength of 2.
ClayBrick
ClayBrick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Brick, with full strength of 1.
CrackedBrick
CrackedBrick is the abstract class extends from the abstract class Brick.
DebugConsoleController
The controller class of the debug console, extends from the abstract class GameSceneController and defines the event handlers of the debug console.
GameBoard
GameBoard is the class that integrates classes GameBoardFactory, GameBoardManager and GameStatusBar.
GameBoardFactory
GameBoardFactory is the class takes the responsibility of producing the image as the source of the view of the game objects, which used to show the game board with different color theme.
GameBoardManager
GameBoardManager is the class which takes the responsibility of controlling some game objects (ball, paddle and bricks) and store the status info of the game.
GameEndMenuController
The controller class of the game end menu, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the game end menu.
GameSceneController
Abstract class GameSceneController is the base class for those controller classes whose scene is the sub-scene of the game board.
GameSoundFactory
GameSoundFactory is the class provides game media players.
GameStatusBar
GameStatusBar is the class visualizes the game status info.
GoldenBrick
Golden brick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class CrackedBrick, with full strength of 4.
GuidanceController
The controller class of the guidance scene, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the guidance scene.
KeyInputListener
The controller class defines the key event listener for the whole game (designed for all scenes in the game, but only the listener for game board is implemented).
MainMenuController
The controller class of the main menu, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the main menu.
Movable
Graphics class implements Interface Movable should be able to move in the game board.
NormalSceneController
Abstract class NormalSceneController is the base class for those controllers whose scene is at the same level of the game board.
Paddle
Paddle is the abstract base class for all paddle classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all paddle classes.
PaddleModel
Model class of the paddle, which defines the attributes (width, height and the position of the top-center point) of the paddle and provides methods to access/modify these attributes.
PauseMenuController
The controller class of the pause menu, extends from the abstract class GameSceneController and defines the event handlers of the pause menu.
PreferencesController
The controller class of the preference scene, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the preference scene.
RankingListController
The controller class of the ranking list, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the ranking list.
RankingListModel
Model class of the ranking list, which provides functions to sort records and stores the history top 5 records after sorting.
RubberBall
RubberBall is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Ball, with radius of 5.
RubberPaddle
RubberPaddle is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Paddle, with width 150 and height 10.
StartGame
StartGame is the Main class of the project which takes the responsibility of initializing the game board, switching scenes, transferring data between scenes and starting the program.
SteelBrick
SteelBrick is the concrete class extend from the abstract class Brick, with full strength of 1.
UsernameFormController
The controller class of the username form, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the username form.
